titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Protestants of France, lately presented to his most Christian Majesty, by the Mareschal Schomberg, and the Marquis Ruvigny. A true copy in English.
titleStmt.author: Schomberg, Friedrich Hermann Schomberg, Duke of, 1615-1690.
Ruvigny, Henri de Massue, marquis de, ca. 1605-1689.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: first page creased and stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
